body.name: Handheld Steam Cleaner Portable High-pressure Steam Cleaner with 3 Brushes and 1 Glass Scraper Quickly Generates High-temperature Steam to Deeply Clean Kitchens and Car Seats
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 21 hrs 53 mins
features: 【A Good Partner for Home Cleaning】The steam cleaner can generate high-pressure steam at 105℃（221℉) within 10s, effectively removing stubborn stains that are difficult to clean, such as kitchen sink, countertop, BBQ grill, toilet, floor, kids’ toy, pet mattress, car, sofa, and clothing

【Large Capacity Water Tank】Our steam cleaning machine is equipped with a large water tank with a capacity of 1200ml, so adding water once can continue to use for half an hour. You can also add some cleaning agents to the water to help you clean

【Practical Supporting Facilities】This steam cleaner is equipped with three sizes of metal brush heads and one glass scraper, which can clean stoves, walls, windows, car seats, and more. An additional pair of silicone gloves is included to ensure safe use

【Applies to Multiple Scenarios】The steam cleaner can be widely used in kitchen, bathroom and living room such as cleaning range hoods, stoves, refrigerator, tub, upholstery, grout, tile, window, couch, floors, carpet, toys, grill, car detailing, etc
【Steam Cleaner's Guarantee】1-year warranty and lifetime support provided by SMAYDA. Message us if you have any problems.Any quality issues caused by non human reasons can be replaced for free

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Power of Clean: A Review of the Triple Brush SteamMaster Portable Steam
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The SteamMaster's triple brush design impressed me with its versatility, effortlessly handling various surfaces and stains. The high-pressure steam capability ensured a thorough, chemical-free clean, promoting an eco-friendly approach. Portability was a breeze, thanks to its compact design and quick heat-up time. The durable build and user-friendly controls make it a reliable cleaning companion.It does come with a set of gloves and also different nozzles incldg. metal bristled ones to clean.However, few things to note1. as you can see from 3rd picture if by any chance you loosen up the tube where it connects to the base unit, you will have to remove the screws to tighten the coupling net and pull the tube back again. It is constricted and a pain- so be careful about it.2. Be sure to use the gloves as the metal wand gets *really* hot and can scald you if you are not careful.3. You might be better off using water that has less dissolved solids ( aka less hardness) as it might calcify quickly. Be sure to empty the unit and also clean it up for storage.I, for myself prefer using steam cleaning and not use harsh chemicals while cleaning. Though, the unit does mention that you can add cleaning chemicals ( vinegar ?) while using it.In summary, the SteamMaster combines efficiency, versatility, and eco-friendliness in a compact package, earning its place as my go-to cleaning solution.- 4 stars because of the issue mentioned above

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Game-Changer in Cleaning: Review of a Steam Cleaner
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I must say, this steamer has introduced a refreshing change to my cleaning routine. I gave it a whirl around my sink area, and it effortlessly tackled grime without the need for extra scrubbing. Don't miss the video to witness how effectively it cleans grout as well!Using the machine is a breeze: simply fill it with water, power it on, and select the desired level (ranging from 0 to 6). It also comes with several useful attachments and a pair of gloves to keep your hands protected during operation. I appreciate how neatly it can be stored in a small box, which can be tucked away on a shelf when not in use.One thing to note is that it tends to leave a significant amount of water behind, which required me to return with a towel to mop it up. I'm not entirely certain if this is a result of improper use or if other steam cleaners share a similar issue. Nevertheless, it's a powerful cleaning tool worth considering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Worth it! I used it to clean the fridgeand corners. It's so easy to use! Myprevious one broke quickly, so I'm hoping this one will last a long time!
